name: Hilton Clearwater Beach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I can best describe my visit here as pleasantly surprised. Based on reading other reviews I did not expect this to be a typical Hilton and it was not in looks or amenities BUT I will say that it is clean, comfortable, located in the best spot and has an extremely friendly staff which all made this a great stay. I actually arrived a day early and they were able to accommodate me into a room with a nice view (I agree with other travelers, you need to request above 8th floor facing the pier and marinas). This is really a great place to stay, I booked with points so breakfast was included each day ( I would not have paid the price for it) and it was good, everything you could want is within walking distance - especially the beach which is right out the back door and has the nicest sand, tiki bar, great lounge chairs and drink service on the beach. I cannot say anything negative - we really enjoyed our stay and hope to go back.
reviews.title: Excellent Location, Beautiful Beach

reviews.text: We had a fairly decent stay here. I'll break it down. The location was awesome.
reviews.title: Totally adequate

reviews.text: Check in: we pulled up in our rental and it was so busy that there were no bell Carts to bring our luggage up to our room. We brought it up ourselves and had to leave a few items in the car. The lobby was not very crowded but it took a long time to be waited on because there were no organized lines. People were just milling about the lobby. I was waiting in one spot for a while as people were just walking up to the next available receptionist they were closest to. They didn't really care that we were waiting for ten minutes longer they had been. It was a pain.
reviews.title: Outstanding Experience
Great beach and location
reviews.text: Room: the room was large and clean and we had a nice view from room 921. A caddy corner view of the ocean which was lovely. The beds are so comfortable at the Hilton's I have stayed and this king was no exception. The coffee machine was single and double serving and the coffee rather lousy in the room. The housekeeping staff were great. Fresh towels and bed made everyday with new toiletries and lots of them. They even cleaned up my makeup, playing my products neatly on towels

Bathroom: clean but small. The shower waxed and waned annoyingly in temperature and pressure during rush hours, but was pretty consistent during slower times. The complimentary toiletries were nice. They had shampoo, conditioner, lotion, face bar, massage soap body bar and aloe gel. High end stuff.
reviews.title: paying for the location

reviews.text: my family of four (2 daughters 7/9) loved the location and generally most of the Hilton. The location is ideal and the beach can't be beat.
reviews.title: A great location
Spring Break Vacation
reviews.text: It is great to have 2 pools to use when you want a switch up from the gulf.

The only real complaint was the service in certain areas. Check in - A; housekeeping - A. Then rest was in need of some help. I had to wait 10 minutes to get towels at the beach. The two following days they ran out of towels by 11:00 and they said it would be a few hours before they had more. How does that happen?
reviews.title: Great Hilton experience, as always

reviews.text: Also lunch by the pool we were informed it was going to take a bit but 90 minutes for sandwich? the kitchen there is obviously overstretched.
reviews.title: Disapointment!

reviews.text: Add a few more staff for bartenders, servers and you will make a killing in return. Even the drink/snack cart going around the beach was nice but even that was a 10-15 minute wait if you weren't first in line.
reviews.title: superb location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We visited Clearwater in Feb! We got lucky and the weather was more then beautiful! The location was great....it's right in the middle of tons of restaurants and bars! However, we were more then impressed with the beach! Once you check into the Hilton you get a resort pass that gets you a chair on the beach, which guys are working to get you chairs, in the right spot and make sure that they are set up for you!
reviews.title: The beaches are worth the price!
Beautiful beach
reviews.text: The Hilton had a bar on the ocean side so you could get a drink and just enjoy the sun and sand! Again, beach at this resort was as good (or better) as any I've ever been!

The only downfall (our own fault) was the room. We pre bought our room on Priceline and we were given the lowest (most basic) room. It had a very very small window which looked onto the lower roof, which was all air conditioning units! Kind of made us feel claustrophobic! Again, not the hotels fault, just ours for not being aware of how closed off it would be. My suggestion would be to pay the little extra to move up a floor or two! Other the that the room was quite nice and everything the hotel was very modern and nice!
reviews.title: Great Location

reviews.text: We enjoyed our stay! Would love to come back!
reviews.title: Can't beat the location

reviews.text: I booked a room with the partial view and thats what i got. No complaints there. The hotal is very expensive for a older hotel. I did not like the $20 surcharge for beach chairs and fitness room even if you dont use them and then are taxed on the 20. Could not use beach because of weather (coldest week in fl for this time of year) but that is no fault of hotel. Came down to see Phillies play and was very convinient to ball park. the beach is beautiful, just wished i could have enjoyed it. Pool is always crowded. Staff is very friendly and you can walk to all resturants. Rooms are small and bathroom even smaller but are very clean. All in all you can not beat the location and beach.
reviews.title: No room when we got to the hotel even though we had a reservation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here in February this year flying with Virgin, staying at this hotel for 3 nights from their brochure.
reviews.title: Veiw from a Uk visitor
A Huge Disappointment
reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews i was unsure what to expect but it fitted in with our travel plans.
We arrived midday on a Friday and did not think a room would be ready but the receptionist was most helpful and even gave us an upgrade to a larger room with a side view of the beach.
reviews.title: Perfect location, great staff

reviews.text: During our stay everyone was most helpful and friendly, when asking directions they even printed a map out. Room very clean and had no problem with trash . Pool and pool area was always clean staff around to help and no problems with towels or chairs.
reviews.title: Overall good experience

reviews.text: We had breakfast one morning not so good choice limited, also we had dinner one evening burgers very juicy and tasty.
reviews.title: Great value for the price

description: Spread across 10 acres of sandy white beach, surrounded by blue skies and the beautiful Gulf of Mexico.
